ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.

original: intros a b H1 H2 H3. destruct (Z_lt_ge_dec 0 b) as [Hb|Hb], (Z_lt_ge_dec 0 a) as [Ha|Ha]. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos b a Hb H1 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2]. destruct (prime_divisors b Hb a Hd2) as [Hd3|Hd3]; lia. - left. apply prime_rel_prime. apply prime_intro; lia. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (prime_divisors a Ha b H3 Hpr) as [Hd1|Hd1]; destruct Hd1; subst; lia. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos a b Ha H2 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2]. destruct (prime_divisors a Ha b Hd2) as [Hd3|Hd3]; lia.
